website_summaries.verdict: You'll have a hard time finding a more stylish and feature-packed speaker choice in this price range. The inclusion of Bluetooth support makes it an attractive buy for iPad and smartphone owners.
pros: The Sound Platform speaker dock will spoil you with its design details and extensive features, including Bluetooth support, FM radio, iPhone compatibility, a dedicated app, and remote control
cons: Sound quality doesn't hold together at high volumes, the app isn't worth your time, and the integrated screen is dim

customer_reviews.title: Great, but can be hard to connect
customer_reviews.text: I use this connect to myand my android phone. Both work extremely well. However, to connect them seamlessly, you should follow this order 1. keep speakers off 2. turn on bluetooth on sending device 3. turn on soundfreq 4. connect on sending device One time, out of the many times I have used it in several months, it did not want to connect to my phone. I turned it off many times and turned it back on to connect and it worked. The sound is incredible, but I do not know if it's worth the value if you are just needing a decent sounding device. It's not a high end one, but it is quality sounding and aesthetically appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Tech person123

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Classic throwback looks. I like that the dock keeps my old ipod charged as I use it. The sound is amazing! I have not yet tried to pair it with my phone but I'm sure it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic iPhone speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is fantastic!! I consider myself somewhat of an audiophile and have trialed many speaker(s) and systems over the years. Of the many speaker docks I have purchased this one has the best sound and options. From the i-dock to the remote door, ambient light, and fantastic sound output as well as the range of the Bluetooth...all around great value. Bought mine refurbed from amazon warehouse but looked brand new (and paid $84 shipped). If you are looking for a great home speaker, Bluetooth dock, give this a try! And with amazon, you can always send it back!
customer_reviews.author: C. J. L

customer_reviews.title: Will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this over 2 years and finally sold all component audio equipment I have been hanging on to. Does is compete in the hifi segment? Of course not. Does it sound as good or perhaps better than Bose, you bet. It fills the room and packs a punch when you consider I can listen to FM, dock an iPhone, use bluetooth et.al. Highly recommend. Buying two more for other places in the house.
customer_reviews.author: fatty

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a little platform!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we really like this system. We use it in our large living room, and it fills the space like speakers from a much larger system. We've synced via bluetooth and played music from two iPads, an iPhone, and a Mac Pro with no problems or difference in sound. The included remote is pretty cool, but the downloadable app that can do those same functions is way cooler. I'd say that the sound quality is just below that of the Bose system, and for the price, I'd buy it again if it were stolen or lost (no, you can't come steal it).
customer_reviews.author: M. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and wireless convenience
customer_reviews.text: I was skepitcal of getting a Bluetooth based speaker system. From others that I have heard - the sound quality is just not there. This little unit delivers great sound and there are no issues with connection. I stream music from my laptop all the time and it is great. The sound is rich and can get pretty loud for such a relatively small device. It is well made and actually looks good. Overall - a great little audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Faxanadu

customer_reviews.title: White is a classy option!
customer_reviews.text: I originally saw this speaker in black, but the white version was too expensive. Once I saw the price drop, I jumped on it! I'm really glad that I went with the white because it kind of melts into the background. I bought it for the Bluetooth feature and use it all the time and the connection has never dropped. The sound quality over Bluetooth is acceptable for 'background' music.
customer_reviews.author: BestofBothWorlds

customer_reviews.title: Great price to functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very practical music sound. I love the bluetooth feature. It is very easy to setup (There is no manual) from one page of instructions you get it working in 5-10 minutes. It works flawlesly with the iphone. You can come home listen to music while your phone it is being charged. There might be other music sound system with more power but if you just want music for one room this is your system.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Incredible feature set
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that I am not an "audiophile", I am not even sure what qualifies one as such. However, I love this product and find the sound to be very, very good even through Bluetooth. The remote app for the iPhone and iPad is very good as well. Has plenty of power for room-filling sound in our great room (800 sq ft approx), is loud enough to hear while running the vacuum cleaner for example. I can't imagine this unit not having enough volume for anyone unless you are really trying to prove something to the neighbors or the wildlife outside. Very, very pleased, the affordable price is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: IamGrimm

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this unit
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this unit, I like how small it is and am happy with the sound it produces. I am not an audiophile so I can't speak to the technical specs, but I enjoy this unit a lot. Only four stars because their app seems clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Best I have heard yet under $500 mark
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to audio and these guys are what I needed to hear. After trying various Bose systems, I took a gamble with this dock. Treble control and bass control a very nice and rare option. For this price, it's a steal. Had I listened to these in a store, side by side a Bose system, I would have paid more for this and not regretted it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound, clean design
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sound system for a smaller place. I was concerned that the sound would not be satisfying, having looked a long time at the Bose systems, but I am very pleased with the sound quality. The bass is full, the highs are clear but not harsh and the mids clean with no mudiness. The design is nice, too. It pulls a little retro without looking forced.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ridgely

customer_reviews.title: Great Product that Provided What I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Soundfreaq has made a great quality item that I'm glad I purchased. I've been looking for some kind of iPod dock for awhile before I stumbled upon this during a lightning deal and decided to buy because of all of it's features. As others are saying, it produces magnificent sound for the price, at all ranges and at incredible levels of volume. The bluetooth option is much more convenient than I would have expected, especially having an Otter Box case that I have to take off my iPhone just to dock it. So far I've had no issues and am completely satisfied with the Soundfreaq platform, all the way down to the simplistic packaging and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: lpsession

customer_reviews.title: SoundFreaq SFQ1
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I was so excited when i received the item. So easy to set up, actually you just need to plug it in and play. Downloaded the app for the soundfreaq to my Iphone and boom off i go. I played this using my bluetooth. The sound is awesome for such a small unit. Love the style and how clean it is to look at.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.

customer_reviews.title: good musicbox!
customer_reviews.text: bought one for my husband as an accompaniment to his ipad. the bluetooth feature is excellent. makes u kinda lazy though. can switch on music from across the room. very very nice. the volume is excellent. have taken it to several friends' parties (he is now the designated music man!). volume is fine, not for a really big crowd, but does well for up to 30 people in a room and background music type. have since bought one for a friend too.
customer_reviews.author: I. Adedeji

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq SQ1
customer_reviews.text: I bought the SQ1 to use as a speakers for my desktop Mac and also with my laptop. I use it with iTunes, Netflix, and EyeTV as the built-in speakers just don't have the volume or sound to watch a movie if you are sitting more than arms length away from the computer. The SQ1 works great. It is deceptively small but has a big sound. The only issue was trying to program the FM presets. I still can't figure that out but I never listen to FM on it anyway. Good purchase I think.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Beyond All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Room filling sound. Easiest set up with no need to read the directions. Excellent Iphone app. Unlike other reviewers I've not noticed any loss of quality using bluetooth connection, perhaps because the volume is not cranked up. Quality look and feel with pleasantly lighted accents when turned on. Couldn't be more pleased with the SoundFreaq.
customer_reviews.author: gopcharles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality , easily synchronized via Bluetooth , good definition, low power . The best I 've tried so far .
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I know there's a newer version of this out now, but I've had this product for over a year and it has worked flawlessly. My only gripe is the application they offer through the AppStore and Google Play is downright awful, meaning I have to use the packaged remote. This is fine, but if they're going to offer an app I would like it to have the same quality as their other products.
customer_reviews.author: rdy2go

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this system for my husband for his birthday I was a little worried that I would not get it on time but this seller truly came through. The quality of sound is superb I think its even better than the bose. We used it on our patio when a few friends came by for a little get together and they all loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a stereo in our house. This does it all. The sound quality is awesome. The blue tooth connection is great. When I stream internet through my tv, I use the soundfreaq to stream the sound. Had a Boston Acoustic previously and this is much better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fowle

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq SFQ 01
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Soundock, Mid and low range is fantastic. Bluetooth is awesome, with radio. I would definitely recommend this to my friends. Four star because the base disappear above volume 23, but other than that this unit sounds perfect. For the price you will never go wrong, so buy it and experience the great sound of this soundock...i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Fortunato A. Favis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this speaker for over ahead now and I am incredibly impressed with its sound quality for the size that it is. I usually use its Bluetooth capability with my iPhone and never have any problems with it. It's easy to pair up to your phone and the sound is amazing for such a small speaker. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Duane G Orris

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Wow......this product really lives up to the reviews!. Ample bass and clean sound. The iPhone App is outstanding. Very reliable Bluetooth connection. Got it as a lightning deal... Now I'm waiting to pick up another one at a great price! Update: Bought the second one and extremely pleased.....
customer_reviews.author: ABG

customer_reviews.title: Love it.....
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Bose Soundlink and for me, it was just to bass heavy. I returned it. Then I saw this on Amazon. Never heard of it but it had great reviews, so I went for it. Ordered it Sunday night and it arrived on Tuesday (free shipping). LOVE IT. Love the sound. Love the size. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Sensational sound and features
customer_reviews.text: Truly superb design and feature set, and sound that for this modest living room, is absolutely huge. Seems stunning that Sound Freaq has packed so much into such an affordable package. The free iOS app is just what I need it to be -- not too fancy but utterly user-friendly. I'm writing this on the iPad and playing tunes via Bluetooth. Brilliant. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Phenix

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I was really blown away by this product. The sound is amazing for its size. Love the Bluetooth connectivity and the remote app. These two features are what really made this unit desirable to me, and I have not been disappointed. My only complaint is the price. However I would definitely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Giordano903

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and look
customer_reviews.text: We have loved our Sound Platform so far. It was the only iPod dock with a radio that we really loved. Great sound quality. The only downfall I see is that the bluetooth connectivity does not work the best across our house. It works well when you are really close to the device, but as soon as you get farther away into another room it starts to break up. Other than that it has been the perfecting system!
customer_reviews.author: Christian S.

customer_reviews.title: Or, Bought this for My Niece and She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: The niece wanted great bass and cool looks for her bedroom and loves this. Bluetooth works perfectly and she had it paired up before the wrapping paper was cleared and dessert was served.
customer_reviews.author: CrossHands

customer_reviews.title: has good sound other than that and a handy remote with ...
customer_reviews.text: bluetooth never worked from the moment it arrived. has good sound other than that and a handy remote with a hidden storage compartment. The buttons are too small together so you end up hitting the wrong one and the station scanning is super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Wulff

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've loved my Sound Platform for a few months, but it's Soundfreaq's customer service I'm most impressed with now. I had some issues with the Bluetooth between my Droid and my Sound Platform not connecting. I emailed Soundfreaq's customer service with a description of the problem, and 90 minutes later they replied with clear instructions on how to resolve the issue and, if that didn't work, a request to contact them again so they could resolve it and get my Sound Platform working again. The solution they sent worked perfectly. This is some of the best technical support I've ever received for a piece of electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Wutka

customer_reviews.title: Fine product and top marketing
customer_reviews.text: I must share my opinion on the excellent quality of Soundfreaq at a good price and also ought to praise the high professional marketing standards of the company in thinking about its consumers first. This I rate as top quality marketing.
customer_reviews.author: Juan B. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but design problems
customer_reviews.text: This has very good sound quality, so I like it. Drawbacks are that the speaker cover material attracts cat hair etc. and is difficult to clean. Also, the plug is designed with a "cup" around it - liquid spilled and filled up the cup (bad luck) - now the unit no longer charges. This could have been designed better IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shalit

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact unit. While the sound quality is close to my Bose (not on par), the unit cost is much more reasonable. What I like: Sound for the money Remote storage area Radio, Iphone Dock, Bluetooth all in one What I don't like: Control buttons are small and difficult to work Digital read-out is small Iphone app is disorganized, small and offers little more than the actual remote
customer_reviews.author: Theauk

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later, still love it
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. This little guy can pump some volume! The Bluetooth is amazing. Sound quality is great. The remote even works to control a plugged in ipod. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: LuvnMySailor

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking with good sound
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking with good sound. Only complaint is that the bluetooth wanked out on me. don't know if its my technical ignorance, a faulty product, or combo, but it frustrates
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Fierce

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price, awesome use of bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I needed an upgrade in speakers from my old iPod donut. This was a significant improvement. The sound quality for such small speakers at this price is amazing. I can listen to music and have it carry across the living room into the kitchen just fine-- and use the bluetooth so I still have my phone on me and play Pandora. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Received unit and was skeptical as I was unfamiliar with the brand however easy set up and a real quality sound. Works well with my Iphone and Ipod. Definitley a recommend!
customer_reviews.author: OsOBear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Soundfreaq
customer_reviews.text: The product itself has really amazing sound quality, (was comparing between this and Beats Tron Disc); the price is just excellent for this high level sound performance. It's definitely comparable to Bose & Beats, it delivers the details of the pop songs with strong and decent bass. I personally strongly recommend this item for whoever is looking for a speaker for iPod/ iPhone/ iPad. The Bluetooth plays not just music but also any other sounds wirelessly which made this product one of the most innovative among other speakers as for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kuo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy for sub-200 product
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed a number of similar systems per CNET. I have a few other products in our office as well / similar. This unit has a rich and full sound. It is the best unit for its price that I have heard. Very happy / great gift for friends. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound, the look, and ease of use. My only complaint is that it has no way to transition to the new lightning connector, though I almost exclusively use it via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Auracle13

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, good Price
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't too sure about the brand. ( I was one of those Bose or nothing dudes), but I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and the features. You don't even need to have your iPod plugged in to use it. (bluetooth). This is also good for me because I'm constantly on iTunes, and since it's bluetooth I can hook it up with my laptop. -Awesome. It gets pretty darn loud without any kind of distortion. Definitely recommend it to anyone looking to play music from their iPod/laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great sound, and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Soundfreaq. The sound quality is fantastic, set up was a breeze, and the iphone app is really easy to use. I had never heard about the product, but after i read the reviews on Amazon, i bought it.....an am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Lam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews before I ordered this item and am pleased with the product. For such a small unit (approx. 13" wide, 7" high and 7" deep), it delivers great sound with depth. It replaced a Bose system that decided to die. Nice and simple for set up. Works with iPOD touch (original) and gives another charging option for it. FM radio just fine (no AM). Has a little remote if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Randyll

customer_reviews.title: iTS VERY RETRO LOOKING AND SEAMLESS CONNECTIVITY WITH YOUR SMART PHONE. GREAT FOR A LIVING ROOM OR HOME ...
customer_reviews.text: iTS VERY RETRO LOOKING AND SEAMLESS CONNECTIVITY WITH YOUR SMART PHONE. GREAT FOR A LIVING ROOM OR HOME OFFICE, BEDROOM ETC. IF YOU WANT TO ENHANCE THE SOUND WITH MORE SOUND OPTIONS DOWNLOAD A EQUALIZER APP FROM YOUR APP STORE.
customer_reviews.author: Endless Boogie, JLH

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound system, love the Bluetooth and the soundfreaq remote app is really convenient. I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this with my IPhone and my Mac Book. It sits across the room and the IPhone and computer sit on my desk. Sound is great, and the remote app works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Item is great - easy to connect, great sound. Best customer service ever! Twice I wrote an email inquiry - Both times they called within the hour and once was on Christmas Eve around 10pm. Item had malfunctioned and they sent a new unit out that day. Amazing! They stand by their product and this one is excellent quality and links to all our iPads, iPods and iPhones with ease. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: great little system
customer_reviews.text: as good as the bose - did an ab test with them and very much more reasonable priced. use in my sewing room with my bluetooth devices - galaxy 3s
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Goodkin

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Have as a gift and was perfect. Used at the office. The Bluetooth is key. Sound is super for the money. I have recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: Hula

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The ease to operate, the great App you can download to operate it, and the ability to connect over Bluetooth makes this a perfect product. The sound is much better than I thought it would be from reading the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Trabecca

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are incredible. They work incredibly well via Bluetooth for both my iPhone and my computer; I have yet to try my PS3, but hey, 2/3 is pretty good if all fails. AND THE SOUND IS GORGEOUS. The UQ3 feature creates such a stunning and clear beat and all the songs I've had in my music library for years are now sounding new. It's incredible. Wonderful value. Buy them if you want awesome speakers.
customer_reviews.author: wordcutouts

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great. I use it to play music wirelessly from my iPad. It has good sound, good bass. Was worried about it being able to handle backyard (outside) cookouts, but it sounds great there too. Plenty of power and bass for outside. The iPad app for the remote is a great idea, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lichtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with MacBook Air and iPad Mini. Radio..not great reception in my apartment. Sounds great for such a small package.
customer_reviews.author: lib teach

customer_reviews.title: great product and value. sad they dont iphone 5 dock yet.
customer_reviews.text: great sound .great value , great size does the job well . i am happy with the product and company that makes it . would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Harpreet S. Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The Sound Freaq Sound Platform is a great product at a great price. Product works seamlessly with the Bluetooth connectivity. It sounds great and is a great value. Sound compares with much more expensive brand name expensive systems. I own two other IPod docking systems which I paid much more for. One is broken and the other doesnt work with the latest Ipod's. I highly recommend the Sound Freaq products.
customer_reviews.author: dmar11bb

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Def comparable quality to boss speakers I had in the,past and at less than half of the price!
customer_reviews.author: laura p

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was EXACTLY what we wanted. Hooked up by bluetooth to an iPhone to play iTunes and Pandora. Couldn't have been easier to hook up, easy to control from the phone, and sound as good as much more expensive products. It's small but it fills our open and large kitchen area with lovely music! We listen mostly to Jazz and it handles the highs and the lows quite well.
customer_reviews.author: JamesB

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds great. Hate that you have to look on line for instructions but I guess that is way things are done these days.
customer_reviews.author: Brunchers

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, just not good for a party
customer_reviews.text: They system does give great sound, but just be careful and don't use as a party system. Toasted the 1st one but the company did repair and return and its working great. Just will not use for the party.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Terry

customer_reviews.title: best sound ever!!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic sound, really easy to use with multiple devices love the hidden compartment for the remote and gotta love the white color
customer_reviews.author: E. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth ftw!
customer_reviews.text: when i get to my dorm i just tap a button on my iphone and my music plays crystal clear through this sexy speaker. Freedom from wires is exceptional i never thought i would love bluetooth so much
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Freakin excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We've had the Soundfeak for about a month now and absolutely love it! Superior sound and functionality! No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: TippyTyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I have two. One for the office and one for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Burndrett

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker because of the excellent review from Amazon. It's not as good as i expected sound vise. but all other functions like IOS control and remote are very user friendly and handy. I think its a 5 star for the price i paid. But i think the dearer brands (like Bose) are definetely producing better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I really had wanted a Bose system, but honestly, I didn't want to spend the money. I am beyond impressed with this system. It was easy to set up and the sound is fantastic! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DDuke

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Device!
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. This item is a no-brainer; out of the box it took 5 minutes to set up and it sounds great. The bluetooth function works seamlessly and I was playing music from Pandora in a short period of time. Do not hesitate to buy this system. I picked it up as a "Deal of the Day," and it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Count Leo T.

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq sounds and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my choice! Soundfreaq SFQ-01 looks great and has excellent sound quality for a very reasonable price. I have a Bose docking station at home, and at this point, I prefer Soundfreaq (to my own surprise!). The extra features, like bluetooth, radio, etc. make it a great buy. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: arqbea

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality; should have spent the extra money on the Sony! Does work just sound quality with any bass isn't clear.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq
customer_reviews.text: This product has very good sound for the price and has an easy to use interface. It is a no brainer for setup and the remote works well. I really enjoy the sound quality and the fact that it charges my iPhone 4. I would definitely recommend this item to anyone who enjoys playing music from their iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: bangorfb

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq is a sure fire hit for a teeneager in the house.
customer_reviews.text: I would certainly recommend this product to any parent looking for a Christmas gift for a teenager that enjoys music. Has outstanding sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Seale

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Work great, loved it. There is also an app on smart phone that u can down load and use it as a remote control
customer_reviews.author: Mhtran

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but great sound
customer_reviews.text: We put this on top of a cabinet and just connect via bluetooth. Easy to connect, amazing how good the sound is from such a small device. Just wish it were a little cheaper. We've had it over a year and use it daily- great item.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalDK

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This item has great sound but sometimes has issues with bluetooth connection even if the other device is set on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I waited 2 weeks for the product!!! But it was well worth the wait. I rate it a 4 because it is for a 4th generation apple product and I have a 5th generation product and you cant use the speakers without purchasing another $30 piece of elecronic
customer_reviews.author: Josie Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Wireless Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is another gift to my grandson. He approves and has been happy with it. At least that is what he says.
customer_reviews.author: Karin K

customer_reviews.title: It's Freq'n awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Really good sound. Aesthetically pleasing and just all around well designed. Would be even better if it did HD radio.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scheffel

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Been looking around BT speaker for a while and finally! Guys just stop thinking and buy this small beast. Amazing sound and BT distance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely pleased with the sound quality - much better than a Bose sound dock that costs twice as much. The sleek, modern design will look perfect in any space. Would definitely recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Fireeon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works every time, isn't that what it is supposed to do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. It's loud enough that it fills the first floor of our house with music and I love the bluetooth ability.
customer_reviews.author: RHS

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for my buck
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sound system! The speaker is incredibly powerful with high quality sound especially for a compact sound system. Would recommend this over a Bose system any day!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got the first generation of the speaker and its super light with great sound effects, and goes extremely well with any in-home decor.
customer_reviews.author: rko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Though I haven't used the bluetooth feature as of yet. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael de los rios

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool tunes
customer_reviews.text: Soundfreaq SFQ-01 Sound Platform Bluetooth Wireless Speaker sleek and simple design. good sound. reasonable price.. nothing more to ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Chin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase , clear sound , big sound , small machine , reliable , durable , looks nice . Worth all the money that I spent ! Would definitely buy for someone .
customer_reviews.author: GeGe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The sound is great, sturdy build. The bluetooth connectivity couldn't be any easier, and you will definitely impress your friends when they see you controlling the stereo with your phone!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Haley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...
customer_reviews.text: I have this setting in my office and I get comments on it all the time. The sound is very good for such a small unit. Links to my MacBook in a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Moore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Bluetooth connectivity excellent. The only complain I have is, the power supply unit is kinda bulky and limits mobility.
customer_reviews.author: vikneswaran

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect for our family
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has bluetooth! We use it all the time , its loud and we can listen to the radio on it! I love it! Very happy withit
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq has a great sound and looks great on my desk
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. Easy to set up and it also has great sound. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, compact, great sound. Well worth the money fills the space with awesome sound, with the build in equalizer you hear things in music for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G Breidenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Does everything well.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Fantastic addition to my music equipment. It has many uses since it is small enough to transport. The sound can compare to Bose system. But a lot cheaper in price.
customer_reviews.author: Luvteeth

customer_reviews.title: The best buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very technologically savvy but this was easy to pair with my android phone to steam pandora and sounds great. It was very easy to set up and easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wasko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: For its price, the sound emitted by this is incredible. Couldn't be happier with the product! Deep bass, rich sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great item wish it  had a battery
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my dad for father's day - he loves it, and it does sound great even outside. It still has strong bass outside. The only thing I didn't realize is that it doesn't have a battery, I wish it did!!
customer_reviews.author: murrr77

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who states this bluetooth had great sound for the price and jut what was wanted. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound + Cool Bluetooth + Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend's birthday. He loves it. It has great sound, a sleek design and a user-friendly app to use with the absolutely cool bluetooth option. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: AED

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth enabled sound system ever
customer_reviews.text: I tried many others. This one was the best! Since I bought it I had two of my friends also buying.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno M. Stuani

customer_reviews.title: Love iit!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and very convenient i don't have to go to the device to look for a song or anything... happy with my purchase :D
customer_reviews.author: BeatLO

product_meta.title: Soundfreaq SFQ-01 Sound Platform Bluetooth Wireless Speaker (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingNo longer do you need to dock your smart device just to play music. Soundfreaq's Sound Platform lets you stream all of your audio wirelessly with Bluetooth, so you can keep multi-tasking with your device. Now you can play your music and continue to write emails and texts, browse the web, play games and use apps all while you keep your device exactly where it belongs - at your fingertips.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER




THE REVIEWS ARE IN:


"I'm a big fan of Soundfreaq's speaker. It looks cool, sounds great, and offers useful extras such as Bluetooth pairing" — CNET

"Soundfreaq's SFQ-01 will hands down beat the design of most any speaker you've ever see" — Gadget Review

"It's not only an incredibly easy dock to use, the sound quality is brilliant...accomplishes everything it promises to do" — Pocket-lint

"SFQ-01 sounds cleaner and does better with high-frequency sounds...superior high-volume performance" —iLounge

"To our ears, the Soundfreaq sounded great and had excellent bass response for such a small unit. With its boxy shape and shiny chrome knobs, the Soundfreaq looks gorgeous." —Mac|Life



THE MOST VERSATILE HOME SPEAKER IN THE WORLD
Soundfreaq's Sound Platform delivers high-Fidelity sound performance with the convenience of Bluetooth wireless.

Keep your device in your hand while your stream audio wirelessly. >  SOUNDFREAQ SOUND PLATFORM AT A GLANCE:
 * Stream audio wirelessly from any smart device
 * Plays any audio from music, apps, movies, videos, etc
 * 4 ways to play: Bluetooth, Dock, Aux In and built-in FM Radio
 * Exceptional acoustics, crafted to capture every note
 * Big sound, small footprint– streams up to 33 feet
 * Dock and charge iPhone and iPod devices
 * Easy for anyone to use– one step pairing with no passwords or complicated instructions
 * Bluetooth technology standard makes it perfect to be shared in a multi-device household
 * Bluetooth is compatible both with your devices today, and the future devices of tomorrow
 * Sleek, modern design
 * Remote control stores in side compartment
 * Soundfreaq Remote app complimentary on Apple's App Store


BLUETOOTH TECHNOLOGY: KEEP THE POWER IN YOUR HAND, NOT STUCK IN A DOCK
No longer do you need to dock your smart device just to play music. Soundfreaq's Sound Platform lets you stream all of your audio wirelessly with Bluetooth, so you can keep multi-tasking with your device. Now you can play your music and continue to write emails and texts, browse the web, play games and use apps all while you keep your device exactly where it belongs - at your fingertips.

A2DP Bluetooth compatible devices. >  SOUND PLATFORM IS COMPATIBLE WITH ANY A2DP BLUETOOTH DEVICES INCLUDING MOST:
 * Smartphones, mobile phones and tablets
 * Laptop and desktop PCs including Windows and Mac OS
 * Apple: iPad and iPad 2, iPhone, iPod Touch, MacBook and iMac
 * Android smartphones and tablets including Motorola Zoom, HTC, Samsung and Dell
 * Blackberry smartphones, Blackberry Playbook tablet and most mobile phones
 * Windows Mobile devices


EXCEPTIONAL SOUND PERFORMANCE: EVERY GENRE AT ANY VOLUME 
Designed for music lovers, Sound Platform is acoustically balanced to complement every genre, at any volume. Meticulously engineered, Sound Platform is crafted for natural bass response, vocal clarity and full stereo separation to fill any room with exceptional acoustics. With custom-engineered and Kevlar-reinforced balanced drivers, acoustically tuned dual-port chamber and UQ3 spatial enhancement processor, Soundfreaq's Sound Platform delivers big sound with a small footprint.

WIRELESS FOR ALL
Sound Platform works with Bluetooth— the wireless standard for mobile devices— and makes it incredibly easy to share and enjoy in a multi-device, multi-user household. Bluetooth technology is now a universal standard and ensures that Sound Platform is compatible with your devices today as well as tomorrow.

Stream audio from tablets, smartphones and computers. EASY TO USE
Pairing your device with Sound Platform is a snap; no passwords or complicated instructions means you can start enjoying exceptional sound immediately. It contains an Apple 30-Pin Connector Universal Well that supports playback and charging for iPhone and docking iPod devices. There is also an FM Stereo Radio with external antennae and an Aux-in 3.5mm line in jack that accepts input from any device with a standard headphone jack.

MODERN DESIGN
Every aspect of Sound Platform was carefully conceived both inside and out including such design details as Accent lighting, remote control with magnetic backing, and an Apple dock cover. Sound Platform's sleek, modern design and hint of retro influence allows it to fit seamlessly into any home décor.

APP ENHANCED LISTENING
Stream audio from any app on your smartphone or tablet. With your device in hand, enjoy listening to audio with thousands of great music, Internet radio, entertainment and game apps (Pandora, YouTube, Netflix, HBO GO, etc). Additionally, the companion Soundfreaq remote app turns your iPad, iPhone or iPod touch into the ultimate remote control. Users control what is playing from the speakers via their device, while enjoying the freedom to multi-task. But you don't need the app to enjoy Sound Platform. And should your device be docked, there is a handy remote control that fits conveniently in a hidden compartment.
feature_bullets: The Sound Platform works with devices with Bluetooth - the wireless standard for mobile devices - which makes it easy to share in a multidevice, multi-user household and compatible with future devices.
With built-in Bluetooth capability, you can stream audio directly to the Soundfreaq SFQ-01 Sound Platform without missing a beat;letting you keep your device exactly where you want it – in your hand.
Not only does the Sound Platform bring music to life, it plays any audio from your iPad and smart mobile devices. Soundfreaq delivers a crystal clear audio experience.
With custom-engineered and Kevlar-reinforced balanced drivers, acoustically tuned dual-port chamber and UQ3 spatial enhancement processor, Soundfreaq delivers big sound with a small footprint.
